summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Municipal Court; authorizing the execution of agreements with the Administrative Office of the Courts for financial assistance for activities to provide increased safety and justice for victims of domestic violence; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2002 budget of the Court; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Community Development
